title: Impeachment, 2020, Oil Speculation Rule
itunes:title: Impeachment, 2020, Oil Speculation Rule
description:
Panel guests: Al Mottur, Partner at Brownstein, Hyatt, Farber & Schreck and Brian Darling, former Senior Communications Director for Sen. Rand Paul and Founder of Liberty Government Affairs.


Kevin also spoke to Heath Tarbert, Chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission in an exclusive interview about the release of a new plan for limiting the size of bets that hedge funds and other traders can make on derivatives tied to various commodities.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
